short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your google have a cookie monster background!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your google have a cookie monster background! So basically just go to google.com or any other google affiliated website and you can see the cookie monster in the background! This is a very simple extension and it is actually a funny extension too!
